metadata.description: This special edition has never before seen images and character designs from the series. Welcome to Baneberry Academy! This is a school not unlike your own, full of cliques of like-minded individuals. But there is one thing that makes this Academy quite a bit different; it's full of fairies! That's right, the winged creatures you believed were a myth are in fact real and those that have fallen by the wayside have made their way here. It's a new semester at Baneberry and that means there will be new faces. Come meet the new students and staff at Baneberry Academy for Wayward Fairies! This graphic novel features never before seen images!
metadata.name: Baneberry Creek: Academy For Wayward Fairies (Arcana)
